00011 using namespace Ogre;
00012 class PVPhysics
00013  {
00014   /// Constant for gravity g = -9.81
00015   const static Vector3 GRAVITY;
00016   /// Damping factor
00017   const static float DAMPING;
00018   
00019  public:
00020   /// Constructor
00021   PVPhysics();
00022   /// Destructor
00023   ~PVPhysics();
00024   
00025   /**
00026    * \brief simulate function which calls move function and collision detection.
00027    * \param objectMap map with objects.
00028    * \param numberOfFlyingBalls current shooted balls.
00029    * \param time delta time elapsed since last frame in seconds.
00030    */
00031   void simulate(std::map<std::string, PVNode*>& objectMap, 
00032        std::vector<PVNode*>& balls, 
00033        int numberOfFlyingBalls, 
00034        float time);
00035   /**
00036    * \brief function for shooting a ball.
00037    * \param ball a PVnode.
00038    * \param time a float for the time since last frame.
00039    */
00040   void move(PVNode* ball, float time);
00041   /**
00042    * \brief function for calling the particular collision detection function for each node type.
00043    * \param objectMap map with all scene nodes.
00044    * \param balls vector with all balls.
00045    */
00046   void collisionDetection(std::map<std::string, PVNode*>& objectMap, 
00047         std::vector<PVNode*>& balls, 
00048         int numberOfFlyingBalls);
00049   /**
00050    * \brief detects collision between arena and a ball.
00051    * \param *arena scene node.
00052    * \param *ball
00053    */
00054   void collisionWithArena(PVNode *arena, PVNode *ball);
00055   /**
00056    * \brief detects collision between wall and a ball.
00057    * \param *wall scene node.
00058    * \param *ball
00059    */
00060   void collisionWithWall(PVNode *wall, PVNode *ball);
00061   /**
00062    * \brief detects collisionbetween balls.
00063    * \param *ball1 scene node.
00064    * \param *ball2
00065    */
00066   void collisionWithBall(PVNode *ball1, PVNode *ball2);
00067   /**
00068    * \brief detects collisionbetween pillar and a ball.
00069    * \param *pillar scene node.
00070    * \param *ball
00071    */
00072   void collisionWithPillar(PVNode *pillar, PVNode *ball);
00073   
00074   /**
00075    * \brief handles collision between a ball and a scene node.
00076    * \param node a scene node.
00077    * \param ball a ball.
00078    */
00079   void handleCollision(PVNode *node, PVNode *ball);
00080   /**
00081    * \brief handles collision between ground and a ball.
00082    * \param ground a scene node.
00083    * \param ball a ball.
00084    */
00085   void handleCollisionWithGround(PVNode * ground, PVNode *ball);
00086   /**
00087    * \brief handles collision between balls.
00088    * \param ball1 first ball.
00089    * \param ball2 second ball.
00090    */
00091   void handleCollisionWithBall(PVNode *ball1, PVNode *ball2);
00092

00094
